alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Doniphan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 22 at 12:43PM CST until December 24 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snowfall has ended across the area. Blowing snow and periods of reduced visibility will continue to be possible through Friday. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Kansas and north central, northeast, northwest and west central Missouri. * WHEN...Until noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
